00039       class init_visitor :public CycleDetector {
00040       public:
00044        explicit init_visitor(TICK final)
00045          :m_final(final) {}
00050        init_visitor(init_visitor const &other) 
00051          :CycleDetector(other), m_final(other.m_final) {}
00053        virtual ~init_visitor() {}
00054        
00070        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00071          if( is_valid(r) )
00072            r->initialize(m_final);
00073        }
00074       protected:
00080        TICK m_final;
00081 
00082       };
00083 
00106       class sync_scheduller :public CycleDetector {
00107       public:
00117        typedef std::list<graph::reactor_id> reactor_queue;
00118 
00132        explicit sync_scheduller(reactor_queue &sync_order)
00133          :m_sync(&sync_order) {}
00140        sync_scheduller(sync_scheduller const &other) 
00141          :CycleDetector(other), m_sync(other.m_sync) {}
00143        virtual ~sync_scheduller() {}
00144 
00154        void discover_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00155          // First encounter with r :
00156          //   - inform him that a new tick has started 
00157          //        this will result on dispatching its goals if possible
00158          if( is_valid(r) )
00159            r->newTick();
00160        }
00161        
00172        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00173          // Completed all the vertex below :
00174          //   - this the next candidate to be synchronized
00175          if( is_valid(r) )
00176            m_sync->push_back(r);
00177        }
00178 
00179       private:
00181        reactor_queue               *m_sync;
00182 
00183        sync_scheduller(); // no code in purpose
00184       };
00185 
00186     }
00187   }

00199 TICK Agent::initialTick(Clock *clk) {
00200   return (NULL==clk)?0:clk->initialTick();
00201 }

00207    m_clock(clk), m_finalTick(final) {

00229 Agent::~Agent() {
00230   m_proxy = NULL;
00231   clear();
00232   if( NULL!=m_clock )
00233     delete m_clock;

00236 // observers :
00237 
00238 bool Agent::missionCompleted() {
00239   if( count_reactors()<=1 ) {
00240     // If there's only one reactior left it is probably
00241     // my AgentProxy => no real reactor available
00242     syslog()<<"No reactor left.";
00243     return true;
00244   }
00245   return getCurrentTick()>=m_finalTick;
00246 }

00250 bool Agent::setClock(Clock *clock) {
00251   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00252     m_clock = clock;
00253     updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00254     return true;
00255   } else {
00256     delete clock;
00257     return false;
00258   }
00259 }

00266 void Agent::loadConf(rapidxml::xml_node<> &config) {
00267   if( !is_tag(config, "Agent") )
00268     throw XmlError(config, "Not an Agent node");
00269   // Extract attributes
00270   try {
00271     Symbol name = parse_attr<std::string>(config, "name");
00272     if( name.empty() )
00273       throw XmlError(config, "Agent name is empty.");
00274     set_name(name);
00275     m_finalTick = parse_attr<TICK>(config, "finalTick");
00276     if( m_finalTick<=0 ) 
00277       throw XmlError(config, "agent life time should be greater than 0");
00278   } catch(bad_string_cast const &e) {
00279     throw XmlError(config, e.what());
00280   }
00281   // Now iterate through the sub-tags 
00282   ext_iterator const c_start(config, "config"); 
00283   ext_iterator iter; 
00284 
00285   if( !c_start.valid() )
00286     throw XmlError(config, "Agent node do not have sub nodes.");
00287 
00288   // First load the plugins :
00289   syslog()<<"Loading plug-ins...";
00290   iter = c_start;
00291   if( is_tag(*iter, "Plugin") )
00292     loadPlugin(*iter);
00293   for( iter.next("Plugin"); iter.valid(); iter.next("Plugin") )
00294     loadPlugin(*iter);
00295 
00296   
00297   // Look for A clock : Note only the first clock found is used
00298   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00299     SingletonUse<Clock::xml_factory> clk_f;
00300     iter = c_start;
00301     clk_f->iter_produce(iter, m_clock);
00302   }
00303   // List the reactors available for helping the user :
00304   SingletonUse<xml_factory> reactor_f;
00305   
00306   // First look for the reactor types available
00307   std::list<Symbol> reactors_types;
00308 
00309   reactor_f->getIds(reactors_types);
00310   if( reactors_types.empty() ) {
00311     syslog()<<"ERROR : no reactor types available.";
00312   } else {
00313     // Display the list of reactor types
00314     std::ostringstream oss;
00315 
00316     while( !reactors_types.empty() ) {
00317       oss<<"\n\t- "<<reactors_types.front();
00318       reactors_types.pop_front();
00319     }
00320     syslog()<<"Loading reactors; available reactor types are :"<<oss.str();
00321 
00322     iter = c_start;
00323     add_reactors(iter);                     
00324   }
00325   
00326   // Now load and post the goals 
00327   syslog()<<"load initial goals of the agent";
00328   iter = c_start;
00329   sendRequests(iter);
00330 }

00332 void Agent::loadConf(std::string const &file_name) {
00333   bool found;
00334   std::string name = manager().use(file_name, found);
00335   if( !found ) {
00336     name = manager().use(file_name+".cfg", found);
00337     if( !found )
00338       throw ErrnoExcept("Unable to locate "+file_name);
00339   }
00340   rapidxml::file<> file(name.c_str());
00341   rapidxml::xml_document<> doc;
00342   doc.parse<0>(file.data());
00343   rapidxml::xml_node<> *root = doc.first_node();
00344   if( NULL==root ) 
00345     throw TREX::utils::Exception(std::string("Configuration file : \"")+
00346                              file_name+"\" is empty.");
00347   loadConf(*root);
00348 }
00349 
00350 void Agent::initComplete() {
00351   if( getName().empty() ) 
00352     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent has no name :"
00353                       " You probably forgot to initialize it.");
00354   if( NULL==m_clock )
00355     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent is not connected to a clock");
00356   // Complete the init for the reactors and check that there's no cycle
00357   details::init_visitor init(m_finalTick);
00358   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(init));
00359   
00360   // Check for missing timelines 
00361   for(timeline_iterator it=timeline_begin(); timeline_end()!=it; ++it) 
00362     if( !(*it)->owned() ) 
00363       syslog("WARN")<<"Timeline \""<<(*it)->name()<<"\" has no owner.";
00364   
00365 
00366   // Create initial graph file
00367   std::string graph_dot = manager().file_name("reactors.dot");
00368   std::ofstream dotf(graph_dot.c_str());
00369   
00370   graph_names_writer gn;
00371   boost::write_graphviz(dotf, me(), gn, gn);
00372   syslog()<<"Initial graph logged in \"reactors.dot\".";
00373 
00374 
00375   // start the clock
00376   m_clock->doStart();
00377   syslog("START")<<"\t=========================================================";
00378 }
00379 
00380 void Agent::run() {
00381   initComplete();
00382   while( doNext() );
00383   syslog()<<"Mission completed."<<std::endl;
00384 }
00385 
00386 
00387 void Agent::synchronize() {
00388   details::sync_scheduller::reactor_queue queue;
00389   details::sync_scheduller sync(queue);
00390 
00391   // Identify synchronization order while notifying of the new tick
00392   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(sync));
00393   // Execute synchronization
00394   //  - could be done with a dfs but we choose for now to do it using the
00395   //  output list of sync_scheduller to avoid a potentially costfull graph
00396   //  exploration.
00397   while( !queue.empty() ) {
00398     reactor_id r = queue.front();
00399     queue.pop_front();
00400     // Update timelines for r
00401     r->doNotify();
00402 
00403     // synchronization
00404     if( r->doSynchronize() ) {
00405       double wr = r->workRatio();
00406 
00407       if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00408        // this reactor has deliberation :
00409        //   - add it to the edf scheduler
00410        m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00411       }
00412     } else {
00413       // r failed => kill the reactor
00414       kill_reactor(r);
00415     }
00416   }
00417 }
00418 
00419 bool Agent::executeReactor() {
00420   if( m_edf.empty() )
00421     return false;
00422   else {
00423     reactor_id r = m_edf.begin()->second;
00424     m_edf.erase(m_edf.begin());
00425     r->step();
00426 
00427     double wr = r->workRatio();
00428     if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00429       m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00430       return true;
00431     }
00432     return !m_edf.empty();
00433   }
00434 }
00435     
00436 bool Agent::doNext() {
00437   if( missionCompleted() ) {
00438     if( empty() )
00439       syslog()<<"No more reactor active.";    
00440     syslog("END")<<"\t=========================================================";
00441     return false;
00442   }
00443   synchronize();
00444   
00445   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() && executeReactor() );
00446   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() )
00447     m_clock->sleep();
00448   
00449   updateTick(m_clock->getNextTick());
00450 
00451   return true;
00452 }
00453 
00454 void Agent::sendRequest(goal_id const &g) {
00455   if( !has_timeline(g->object()) )
00456     syslog("WARN")<<"Posting goal on a unknnown timeline \""<<g->object()<<"\".";
00457   m_proxy->postRequest(g);
00458 }
00459 
00460 size_t Agent::sendRequests(ext_iterator &iter) {
00461   size_t ret = 0;
00462   if( iter.valid() ) {
00463     for(iter = iter.find_tag("Goal"); iter.valid(); iter = iter.next("Goal") ) {
00464       sendRequest(*iter);
00465       ++ret;
00466     }
00467     syslog()<<ret<<" goal"<<(ret>1?"s":"")<<" loaded.";
00468   } else 
00469     syslog()<<"There's no tag in this file.";
00470   return ret;
00471 }
